description: Gets information about a partner account. If PartnerAccountId and PartnerType are null, returns all partner accounts.

parameters.name: PartnerAccountId
parameters.description: The partner account ID to disassociate from the AWS account.

nested_items.name: Fingerprint
nested_items.description: The fingerprint of the Sidewalk application server private key.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the resource.

nested_items.name: AccountLinked
nested_items.description: Whether the partner account is linked to the AWS account.
